website_summaries.verdict: The perfect all-in-one palette for traveling or doing your makeup on-the-go.
pros: Comes in natural nude or warm nude to accommodate different skin tones
All-in-one palette can be used as eyeshadow, highlighter, bronzer, and blush
Mirror, eyeshadow brush, and blush brush also included
cons: Some find the highlighter is too subtle, and looks chalky when built up

customer_reviews.title: So freaking amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this palette because a youtuber named "thataylaa" was raving about it. I always wanted to have it since then. Finally bought it though shipping to Japan is pretty high. I don't regret it though because the colors are f********** amazeballs! Highlighter, contour, bronzer, eyeshadow: simply everything is included in this palette! I did a flash photo and a normal one. Seems pretty cool but it's so much prettier in real life :) I want to have the butter bronzer too but I don't have the money lol
customer_reviews.author: Madina

customer_reviews.title: Colors much lighter than shown in product images
customer_reviews.text: I do like the texture, blendability and pigmentation of this product. I am using it as eye shadow. However, someone has boosted the color on the product images shown here. I ordered the Natural Nude palette and the colors are nowhere near as rich as shown in the image. In particular I was looking forward to the pink shades, and in reality they are very light and definitely not as pink as shown here. Despite that, I will use this product.
customer_reviews.author: coolshop

customer_reviews.title: It’s got glow, sheen, just beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I wear this everyday but my above pic has no filter at all. If they ever discontinued this I would be devastated. I’ve used this for years. This is my bronzer all over everyday I love it and can’t live with out it.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: A must-buy all-in-one bronzer/blush/eye shadow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I was disappointed that Physicians Formula no longer sells the Shimmer Strips blush that I used to purchase, and then I saw this product online and decided to try it. I love that it's not only a blush, but also an eye shadow. I have very sensitive skin, and since using this product daily for over a month, I have yet to have a breakout. My skin also suffers some hyperpigmentation from over exposure to the sun, and the shimmery effect of this product (along with the Physicians Formula RX Concealer), really minimizes any noticeable dark spots on my face. Please do not discontinue this product because it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: SrfrGrl

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very Shimmery
customer_reviews.text: I have used and enjoyed Physicians Formula products forever and I am aware that this is a shimmer product. However, if you are over the age of 30 I would not advise using this palette. It does not read warm nude when on, it definitely looks a very light, very shimmery gold.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: It's Alright.
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay product, but after seeing people rave about it I expected a little more. The lighter powders in particular are a bit chalky and there is a fine mirco glitter in them, which I wasn't a fan of. This also definitely isn't the type of highlight you can apply with your finger. If you don't use a brush and really work it into your skin, it just looks like a strip of chalky powder on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: U need this in ur life!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for ALL skin types and colors. Came recommended by one,of,my fav utubers and I'm super happy with it. This is the second one ive purchased! Great formula lasts all day too! Can,be used as highlight, eyeshadow shimmery blush or bronzer.. Just stunning!. I personally am,very fair skinned and have tried all these methods and have never been disappointed. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Z

customer_reviews.title: Truly lovely!!! Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is only the second product I’ve used from this brand. (Previously, I purchased a serum) - Well let me just say I am wowed again!!! The package is exquisite! This contains a soft soft blush brush and a liner/ angled brush w compact mirror built in! So nice! The texture and blending ability is the best ever! Looks FAB on!!! Better than the very expensive Luxury brands! I’m checking out some more products from Physicians Formula now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hadley

customer_reviews.title: A new glow!
customer_reviews.text: I have light ivory skin tones and had been using a rose colored blush for several years. It was a powder and often difficult to blend. When it was time to replace it, I looked for alternatives and found this product. I am very happy with this choice because the new blush color options are more natural looking, easy to blend, and hypoallergenic! I am enjoying my new look and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M. Scaramucci

customer_reviews.title: All you need for the day
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for this price. Able to get results that vary from subtle to shimmery. Great by itself or with other products combined. I'm buying it a third time. I got one each of the the natural and warm, getting one to go to work with me for touch ups/refresh. Make great gifts. I use mine with a set of good makeup brushes, but the quality of the powder is good enough to use with the brushes that come with it in the back compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Aj Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to start highlighting
customer_reviews.text: After watching a beauty blogger (RachhLoves, I think), I decided to try this out. I like that there are a lot of color options (whites to pinks to golden or bronzy shades), so I can use it as a highlight on my cheeks, below my brows, cupid's bow, nose. I do have "nicer" highlights, but this is a good product, and I'd highly recommend it to someone who wants to his/her feet wet in the highlighting game without investing too much money. It's a great drugstore powder highlight option, especially because comes with two very usable brushes.
customer_reviews.author: tinamtc

customer_reviews.title: my product seems like be used and broken by other customers
customer_reviews.text: its not a new product, my product seems like be used and broken by other customers. Q
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not buy this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and highly pigmented. Applies very smoothly and looks gorgeous. Excellent for fair to medium skin tone. Natural Nude has almost half of the colors as variants of highlighters as well as pinkish glow powder. The other two rows of brown/golds can be used beautifully as eye shadows as well bronzers
customer_reviews.author: Nipsy

customer_reviews.title: Natural Nude is the winner! Don’t bother with the Warm Nude.
customer_reviews.text: First of all...the natural nude is better than the warm nude. I first got the warm nude and returned it. It was chalky and looked like it had little glitter/sparkle in them. Did not look natural. But I heard such good reviews about it on youtube, I thought I would give the Natural Nude a try. Its waaaay better! Very natural and glowing! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariaz

customer_reviews.title: Good Colors bad Glue
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit annoyed because the cover came off the siding of the compact. The glue seemed like it was put on with a hot glue gun and i have never had that happen before using Physicians Formula.. Other then that, i love this compact. It has two different brushes that help with applying. The colors are pretty and easy to use with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loyal user, love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only bronzer and highlighter I use. I have a big brush and mix all the colors. The colors all blend together so well. I also sometimes use it for eyeshadow and blush. I've been using it for years! This really is an All-in-1 and it lasts me a long time. I would really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but VERY shimmery!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty-ish. VERY shimmery. It's nice for a quick wash of colour on the eyes or cheeks. Use a light hand and a soft brush. I balance it with mates. Applies smoothly and blends nicely. It wears well, for me. I don't recommend trying to use this as a bronzer! It's best as an eye shadow and highlighter.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like this palette!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually love physicans beauty products, but I do not care for this eye shadow palette. The browns have that ugly orange tint to them which isn’t something I like wearing on my eyes. I have really pretty blue eyes and for me it just looks tacky!
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BOX OF TRICKS!
customer_reviews.text: I can do an entire makeup (foundation, contour, blush, highlight, eyeshadow and concealer) from this one little box. At first I thought that the one pink color in it was too light for blush, but if you combine it with a few of the other colors, the effect is terrific. So then all I need is eyeliner, mascara and lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best highlight/shimmer/eyeshadow ever. You can use it for multiple things. I always go back to this. Its affordable and looks good on any skin. It is glittery, perfect for summer
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for low budget! I cant afford to buy all the different makeup separately so this is beyond perfect and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This is great as eye shadow OR highlighter. Very versatile. Minus one star for the packaging. Having them all clumped in one pressed shape causes a lot of wasted shadow, but for the price it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shine it will add on your face. I use this on my daughter’s make up when she has figure skate competition. It’s subtle, but very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kuniko K. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile !
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I’ve also used the similar product from Bobbi Brown and the beauty of this one is that it also creates the most amazing eyeshadow colors-you can either swirl your brush around for an all inclusive color or just choose one or two. I like to use the gold for the inner eye and then the rest of the colors all over my lid. Best for blue eyes. And of course the cheek highlights it creates is great.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: I like this box of mixed colors for several reasons
customer_reviews.text: I like this box of mixed colors for several reasons. First it is supple but really helps brighten my face. Second I use a big brush and the whole smear of color for full face coverage. Third I can use just a small amout to high-light certain areas such as under brow, cheek bones, or the darker color to hide areas below the chin.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors.  Works great as eye shadow.
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use these colors as eye shadow. I already have blush & a bronzer. I like the colors as eye shadow. They go on smoothly with a brush. It lasts a long time. Has not caused any irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best versatile product out there
customer_reviews.text: This is a great eyeshadow, blush or highlighter. This pallet is great for those trips you might need to pack a little lighter. I carry it for every day.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Zinser

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic and breathable for summer.
customer_reviews.text: Great hypoallergenic makeup price is great very versatile the glitter I could do without but nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love that it can be used in many different ways (eyeshadow, face contouring, blush, etc..). It really brightens up your face without glitter or it being obvious that makeup is doing the trick. It just makes your skin look like it's glowing naturally! It also comes with a brush and small angled sponge applicator. The price on Amazon is almost half the price of my local retail stores!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. I use the bottom 4 rows like ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have much hope for this but my friend insisted that I try it. I really like it. I use the bottom 4 rows like a blush and I really like how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love the shades
customer_reviews.text: Love the shades. It can be used as a bronzer, blush, eye shadow, or all! I usually go with all 3. It also comes with a brush for the face and for the eyes, which I wasn't expecting. There is a guide to how to use as a bronzer and blush, which may be helpful as well!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors!
customer_reviews.text: Eye shadow arrived and was not broken. Colors look very pretty. Haven’t used yet as it is a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Highly pigmented i use on a daily basis love this
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bernacett

customer_reviews.title: Great little set for everyday wear when you don't want ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little set for everyday wear when you don't want bold colors looking unprofessional. The little box with applicators in the back will be handy for travel - especially since it can be used as blush, eyeshadow, and bronzer. I'm not sure how much of makeup shade is actually present, but I'm sure I'll find out eventually. Compact and cute
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Levert

customer_reviews.title: Valuable
customer_reviews.text: I like this plate, it is very good for natural makeup style.
customer_reviews.author: Yanling

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, and colors, even better the price. I am fair coloring works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Magk

customer_reviews.title: This palette is amazing! I use it for contour
customer_reviews.text: This palette is amazing! I use it for contour, highlighter, and eye shadow. There's even a how-to apply on the back, along with a contour brush and eye shadow brush. Such a good deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect all purpose palette. I can use it as eyeshadow and highlighter.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Walmart quit carrying it, so I was happy to be able to order it from here!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Saw great reviews on this product
customer_reviews.text: Saw great reviews on this product, but need to put a lot on the brush to get any highlights. Colourpop is better but can only be applied with fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eye shadow of all time!!I use it every day for eyes and also my cheeks to add some highlight
customer_reviews.author: tdaniellef

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful without being too shimmery which I love! When I put it on the back of my hand it rubs off really fast and I wouldn't say it's incredibly pigmented and does have some fallout. With an eyeshadow base this doesn't seem to be an issue though.. I'm not sure about on the face over other makeup I haven't tried it like that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jobanana

customer_reviews.title: So much better than higher end highlighters
customer_reviews.text: So much better than higher end highlighters. This can be subtle or can be layered for that blinding highlight. Also good for a range of skin tones
customer_reviews.author: MissMeagan

customer_reviews.title: Love the result
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful drugstore highlight that can be built up to be pretty blinding. It’s hard to get a specific color though and mixes up most of the time, but always a pretty result.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Just as I was hoping. Full range of highlighters for multiple use. Perfect for travel when you don't want to bring a bronzer, highlighter, ect with you. Good value. Can cake in creases (I'm 42), but I have to be careful in general.
customer_reviews.author: Creatress

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality make up
customer_reviews.text: This is a little bit flaky/powdery, but the colors are nice and they last all day on your eyes. I love it because it does not have a bunch of bad chemicals in it and it's a nice quality make up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: and bronzing and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pallet for contour, highlight, and bronzing and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great! It's so pretty and goes well with my ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! It's so pretty and goes well with my skin tone and eye color. A lot of reviews said this arrived broken. Mine came in perfect condition. And I don't think the seller should be blamed for that, it's probably the shipping company not handling packages with care.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not so much a bronzer but a shimmery Light glow
customer_reviews.text: Very light and schimmery. Not very bronzey looking . It does make skin look healthy , with a pinkish and white glow
customer_reviews.author: John M. Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: Try this before using a higher end product
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for blush, accented eyeshadow, and or shimmering effect
customer_reviews.author: Scribe by Tamers

customer_reviews.title: This is the all over color in one compact. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the all over color in one compact. Blush and bronzer with a slight sheen that everyone notices, just don't go overboard. A little powder goes a long way which make product last longer. I have had many complements on my skin since using.
customer_reviews.author: kma

customer_reviews.title: Shimmery and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love how versatile this palette is! I use the light pinks as eyeshadow and highlighter, and the tan/browns as blush. It's really smooth and blends well!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not a dupe for BB Shimmer bricks
customer_reviews.text: Not a very strong highlight and takes a lot of building up to become visible. It's subtle, so if that's the look you like then great. However definitely NOT a dupe for the Bobbi Brown shimmer bricks.
customer_reviews.author: maozedonq

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice on the eyes of all places
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is a lovely product. Surprisingly nice on the eyes of all places. However, packaging stinks!!! Box lid ripped almost right after getting it. Makes it hard to keep open when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and the application suggestions are a great way ...
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and the application suggestions are a great way to help contour the face. The other thing that is great is that you can make your own rules on application.
customer_reviews.author: Darla S

customer_reviews.title: I have becca and Jeffrey stars ice cold
customer_reviews.text: This as good as becca or jefree for real I seriously was so impressed such a beautiful highlighter
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rydell

customer_reviews.title: I just got it today. Fast shipped and fast ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today. Fast shipped and fast delivered. Nothing else is damage, except my little bow :( I removed it to harshly .. Awww lmao its ok.
customer_reviews.author: lil sneakie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve been trying so many highlight palletes but found disappointing most of the time. But P.F. is so good! And with a lower price! I’ll purchase more for my friends!
customer_reviews.author: mengyu fang

customer_reviews.title: it is great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because several MUA on Youtube suggested it....it is great for the price point. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FGR

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love! I use it as eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love! I use it as eyeshadow, highlighter, and bronzer. wish the packaging wasn't as bulky, but otherwise, it's awesome! get it, it is literally all-in-1 product.
customer_reviews.author: joyous

customer_reviews.title: Gives a gorgeous, healthy glow!
customer_reviews.text: This product is my skin secret! Every time I wear it, I get compliments on my glow!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Higgins

customer_reviews.title: love this, I have been using the first two ...
customer_reviews.text: love this, I have been using the first two shades on the first two rows almost every day as a highlighter. It gives me a nice subtle glow on my very fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amy West

customer_reviews.title: Great highlight
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this palette. It’s great for eyeshadow, contour, blush, and highlight. I use this everyday!
customer_reviews.author: madelyn

customer_reviews.title: Love the custom colors you can create with this highlight
customer_reviews.text: Love the custom colors you can create with this highlight! The angled sponge tip applicator is surprisingly amazing, can be used wet or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anyone
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for a newbie or an experienced make up artist
customer_reviews.author: Carri K.

customer_reviews.title: Natural Dewy Finish
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful finish and there is a decent amount of usable product. Will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Roy Varghese

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I believe there was a price tag on it. The tag was removed but the glue is still there. It's sticky... That cute pink bowknot is missing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Have been using it since 2012 for bronzer and eye shadow
customer_reviews.author: Samylou

customer_reviews.title: I like this palet - I can use it as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this palet - I can use it as a highlighter and as eye shadow. Nice variety of tones and good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: love the funnies

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Sweet cute colors. Fine glittering great for eyeshadow and cheek highlights. But doesn't last as eye shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband picked this out and I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: George Q. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly!
customer_reviews.text: The color palette was more sparkly than I was expecting. I was hoping for more of an "ambient glow". I gave it to a friend .
customer_reviews.author: Somebodys Mother

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT...
customer_reviews.text: Nice Pallet of Shimmer...Great that you can use it on your face and eyes....Cute packaging....I'm very happy with it...
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Loved this. Way cheaper than at my local walmart.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and pretty case. Cheaper than at the stores near me. It's lasted me for forever too.
customer_reviews.author: Chelcie

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very compact little box with a variety of shades that make my skin glow. I use this almost every day!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea desiree

customer_reviews.title: good when used artfully
customer_reviews.text: I like it if used sparingly, if you use too much you wind up with a very shiny face. But here n there its pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, love it, love it, love it its my favorite and came in the mail very quick.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Long wear and never breaks out my face!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Vanmetre

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a makeup wearer, but when I do this covers most of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a beautiful natural glow. I've using this under my eyes, cheekbones, and bridge of my nose.
customer_reviews.author: TNB

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was looking for light colors to wear on a daily basis. The powder stays put all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. A pretty sheen but it's not so much that you can't wear it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It barely has any pigments, it looks chaky when it goes on, does not really mesh well.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Will buy again. I only got 4 stars because it doesn't actually stay on very long.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality colors! I used it as a highlighter and it stay all day!
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Looks really pretty over my moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Looks really pretty over my moisturizer, I don't need liquid foundation anymore! The only thing about this particular set as opposed to the other color they offer, is that there really isn't a color that works as a blush. The only pink in it is very, very light indeed. But if I can get contour, highlight, eyeshadow and concealer out of one set, then having one separate blush is worth it. Mind, though: It really does glow, it's VERY luminescent. But on my skin it looks wonderful, and it takes very little product to get the effect I want, so putting on my makeup takes 1/4 of the time it used to!
customer_reviews.author: Avery Gordon

customer_reviews.title: My friend was over the moon when she received this ...
customer_reviews.text: My friend was over the moon when she received this as a gift. Thanks for helping me make her day much brighter
customer_reviews.author: Demetria King

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this, great colors for summer, long lasting, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Treetop*Treasures

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for eyeshadow and pretty good for a drugstore highlight. Not such a great bronzer though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shadow goes on nice and smooth, and it also works great as a highlighter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Physicians Formula Shimmer Strips Palette as an add-on item, thinking that I am always looking for lighter golden/champagne shades, because that's what I use on a daily basis to brighten and open up my eyes. But I was very skeptical of this product until I actually tried it. This pallet has very pretty shades, with the right amount of shimmer for that perfect dewy look. The shadow goes on nice and smooth, and it also works great as a highlighter! But I'm taking away one star because the shadow doesn't last more than a couple of hours, even with a really good eyeshadow primer, which is a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging and product broken when received
customer_reviews.text: Package had fallen apart by the time I received it. The cover is no longer on the product, and the product is broken.
customer_reviews.author: CJPent5

customer_reviews.title: Great highlight!
customer_reviews.text: Buttery soft creamy powder highlight! Really beautiful. Not much of a use as blush or bronzer if u r tan skinned. But great as eyeshadow and highlight.
customer_reviews.author: Nameetha dinesh

customer_reviews.title: shimmer strip
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pigmentation. However, doesn't last too long. That doesn't stop me from loving it. Accurate delivery and packaged well for delivery. :)
customer_reviews.author: samyukta

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic highlight.
customer_reviews.text: High quality makeup. Price is on point. Fantastic highlight. !!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice all around makeup that is non-toxic. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly versatile highlighter
customer_reviews.text: I loooove these as highlighters as they are so creamy and pigmented. So great, highly reccomend for highlighter, however I'm not a fan of them for eye shadows as they made my eyes itch- so definitely not good for sensitive eyes. Other than that who cares cause the highlight is amazing, if you're a highlighter junkie you need this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mar

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on pale skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a new shade, and was hoping this variety pack would work. However, none of them show up! I've got pale skin, and expected at least the darker ones to show, but nope! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Love! Use it everyday now!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! Have tried many other brands before and this one really works well on me. It adds a very nice touch of color without overdoing it. I use this product on a daily basis now for work!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: The product came all broken up. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product came all broken up. I bought it as a gift for my daughter and by the time I gave it to her and she opened it and realized it was broken it was to late to return. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Bernazal

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life.
customer_reviews.text: You need this in your life. Truly, for a drugstore product, this is the bomb. You can use it as eye shadow, blush, or highlighter. The formula is buttery, pigmented, and blends really well. Personally, I've found that my skin really likes Physician's Formula products. This is one of those products everybody should have in their make-up bags.
customer_reviews.author: BridgettTop Contributor: Eye Makeup
